snippet: One year on, Japan is still coming to terms with the effects of a devastating earthquake and tsunami. With a post-mortem still under way about whether meltdowns at a nuclear plant could have been avoided, there are warnings that urgent action is...
abstract: One year on, Japan is still coming to terms with the effects of a devastating earthquake and tsunami. With a post-mortem still under way about whether meltdowns at a nuclear plant could have been avoided, there are warnings that urgent action is needed to prepare for future disasters.
